title: Watch: Neeraj Chopra’s golden evening at Tokyo Olympics, overlapping with India’s national anthem
content:
It was seven medals for India at #Tokyo2020! 🥇🥈🥉We take a throwback to the moment Neeraj Chopra struck gold in javelin and made history for his nation. 👏#StrongerTogether | #IND | @WorldAthletics | @Neeraj_chopra1 pic.twitter.com/01feSC6qhu— Olympics (@Olympics) September 9, 2021
